title: Bug 122289[Smoke][Regression][SPMLinux WS]Item can't be dropped to layout from library
description: Bug 122289[Smoke][Regression][SPMLinux WS]Item can't be dropped to layout from library
OB: Details:Item can't be dropped to layout from librarySetp:1.New a library and insert a label2.New a report design and use library3.Drop label from library explorer to layoutActual results:Nothing is dropped into layout. Not only use library in outline, but also in library explorer is no effect.But when I drop the label without use library, it will use library and label can drop in it.
